data.text: Saa anisoadehunu a ɛfa Yuda ne Yerusalem ho no baa Amos babarima Yesaia so wɔ Yuda ahemfo Usia, Yotam, Ahas ne Hesekia berɛ so.
Ao, ɔsoro, montie! Ao, asase yɛ aso!
Nantwie nim ne wura,
Aa, amumuyɛ ɔman,
Adɛn enti na mopɛ sɛ wɔkɔ so boro mo?
Ɛfiri mo nan ase kɔsi mo tiri so
Mo ɔman ada mpan,
Wɔagya Ɔbabaa Sion
Sɛ Awurade
Montie Awurade asɛm,
“Mo afɔrebɔ ahodoɔ bebree no,
Sɛ moba mʼanim a
Monnyae afɔrebɔdeɛ a mode ba a ɛmfra no!
Mo bosome foforɔ afahyɛ ne mo apontoɔ a moahyehyɛ no,
Sɛ mopagya mo nsa bɔ mpaeɛ a,
“Monnwira mo ho na mo ho nte.
Monyɛ papa; monhwehwɛ atɛntenenee
“Afei mommra na yɛnnwene mmɔ mu,”
Sɛ mopene so na moyɛ ɔsetie a,
Na sɛ moampene na mote atua a,
Hwɛ sɛdeɛ kuropɔn nokwafoɔ no
Wo dwetɛ adane adeɛ a ɛho nni mfasoɔ,
Wo sodifoɔ yɛ atuatefoɔ,
Enti, Awurade, Otumfoɔ Awurade,
Mɛma me nsa so, atia mo;
Mɛma mo atemmufoɔ bio sɛ kane no,
Wɔde atɛntenenee bɛgye Sion bio,
Nanso atuatefoɔ ne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ deɛ, wɔbɛdwɛre wɔn abɔ mu,
“Mo ani bɛwu ɛsiane odum anyame a
Mobɛyɛ sɛ odum a ne nhahan apo,
Ɔhoɔdenfoɔ bɛyɛ sɛ adeɛ a ɛhye ntɛm;
